comments.creator: dholbert@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Filing this bug on considering changing nsPrincipal::CheckMayLoad to allow data URIs.

NOTE: I prepared a patch (attachment 565655) to make this change,
as part of bug 686013.  That patch allowed any URIs with the flag URI_INHERITS_SECURITY_CONTEXT.  But that patch failed some tests on TryServer:
 - the mochitest test_bug379959.html  (details in bug 686013 comment 25)
 - the jsreftest regress-328897.js    (details in bug 686013 comment 27)

If we fix this bug here, we can probably revert the patch that ultimately landed for bug 686013, as it won't be necessary anymore.
